headline: Does the Recent Slide in Tyler Tech's Stock Signal a Missed Opportunity?
summary: Wondering if Tyler Technologies might be undervalued, or if its current price hides an opportunity? You are not alone, and there is a lot to unpack before jumping to a conclusion. Despite a solid three-year return of 39.9%, Tyler Technologies has seen its stock drop by 8.7% over the last month and is down 18.9% year-to-date. This signals some recent shifts in how the market views the company. This recent slide has come alongside news of Tyler expanding its public sector partnerships and...
